name: Spectral strike
effects: Attack a random target with a strong hit
Inflicts bleed status on the target
leaderEffects: All allies gain a chance to cause bleed on each non-special attack

info.description: Applies bleed status. Cannot be countered
info.leader: Sharpen blades. All allies get 20% bleed chance on hit.

name: Meditate
leaderEffects: Meditate also applies a small buff to all allies

info.leader: Cloud of Zen. The leader's Meditate also boosts magic, and physical of all allies

name: Cleave
effects: Attacks a full row with a powerful strike
The row with the most enemies is targeted
leaderEffects: Increases the strength of all ally's critical hits

info.header: Attack full row for 75% attack power
info.description: Attacks the row with most gotchis
info.leader: Frenzy. Critical hits are stronger for all allies.

name: Taunt
effects: Applies taunt status to self, forcing enemies to target the Tank.
leaderEffects: The leader gains a chance to launch a counterattack when hit whilst taunting.
Counterattacks cannot be countered by opponents.

info.leader: Steel Counter. Leader has a 50% chance to counter when attacked with taunt active; Taunt increases armor by 50%; A counter attack is for 100% attack power; A counter attack cannot be countered; A counter always hits.

name: Curse
effects: Inflicts fear on the targeted enemy, causing them to skip their next turn.
Removes all positive buffs from the target
leaderEffects: All allies gain a chance to cause fear on each non-special attack

info.header: Attack random for 100% attack power and fear for 1 round
info.leader: Spread the fear. All allies get 20% fear chance on hit; Ignore resistance and stacks with any other status effects the move already does.

name: Blessing
effects: Heals all allies for 20% of their maximum health
Cleanses all allies, removing any negative status effects
Cannot heal/cleanse other Healers including self
leaderEffects: Leader cleanses all allies on all of their turns

info.header: Heal all for 20% and Cleanse (remove status effects)
info.leader: Cleansing Aura. Leader automatically cleanses all allies on each of their turns

name: Thunder
leaderEffects: All ally mage's thunder attacks inflict stun on hit

info.header: Attack all Gotchis and apply stun.
info.leader: Channel the coven. The leader's Thunder attacks for an extra 25% attack power per alive mage ally.

name: Devastating Smash
effects: Attacks a random gotchi with a devastating blow
leaderEffects: Every troll ally does another strong hit when killing with a devastating smash

info.header: Attack Random Gotchi with devastating force.
info.leader: Clan momentum. Every troll ally does an extra attack after a devesating smash.
